Mechanical Engineer Job at Flowitec Group




        
    

        
        Flowitec Group is a leading engineering firm offering cutting-edge solutions for static and rotating equipment. Our skilled team of engineers, technicians, and project managers supply, install, and maintain a wide range of commercial and industrial equipment, including pumps, valves, mixing agitators, and more to optimize operations and increase profitability. We prioritize quality, efficiency,safety, and sustainability, working closely with clients throughout each project stage. Based in Accra, Ghana and Lagos Nigeria, we provide excellent services, competitive prices, and prompt delivery, along with comprehensive after-sales support.
